basics.name: Dongxu Shen
basics.summary: Undergraduate student at Hong Kong University of Science and Technology (Guangzhou), majoring in Artificial Intelligence. Research interests include medical image analysis, large language model security, 3D Gaussian splatting for digital humans, and multimodal learning.

work.name: Digital Human 3D Gaussian Splatting Project
work.summary: Participated in the MoGaFace project focusing on 3D Gaussian Splatting for digital humans.
highlights: (Preprint, Contributor) MoGaFace: Momentum-Guided and Texture-Aware Gaussian Avatars for Consistent Facial Geometry
Contributed to baseline implementation and designed key figures and visualizations for the paper.

work.name: Medical Image Analysis Research
work.summary: Worked with Shidang Xu (SCUT) on large-patch strategies for Whole Slide Image classification.
highlights: (Preprint, Co-First Author) Minimal High-Resolution Patches Are Sufficient for Whole Slide Image Representation via Cascaded Dual-Scale Reconstruction
Developed a feature extractor using 2048-size patches, achieving competitive performance with minimal training samples.

work.name: Large Language Model Jailbreak Research
work.summary: Worked with Prof. Xuming Hu (HKUST) on adversarial security of large language models.
highlights: Explored black-box defense simulations for GPT models.
Designed and implemented prompt-based jailbreak attacks using crafted character sequences.

education.institution: Hong Kong University of Science and Technology (Guangzhou)

projects.name: Financial RAG System
projects.summary: Developed a domain-specific Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) system under Prof. Xuming Hu (HKUST).
highlights: Collected and curated financial data for domain adaptation.
Designed a re-ranking algorithm to improve retrieval relevance.
Integrated with a generative language model for accurate, context-aware responses.
Built a frontend demo showcasing real-time query handling.

publications.name: MoGaFace: Momentum-Guided and Texture-Aware Gaussian Avatars for Consistent Facial Geometry
publications.summary: Contributor. Designed visualizations and implemented part of the baseline framework.

publications.name: Minimal High-Resolution Patches Are Sufficient for Whole Slide Image Representation via Cascaded Dual-Scale Reconstruction
publications.summary: Co-First Author. Proposed 2048-size patch feature extractor for efficient Whole Slide Image classification.
